Author: juwo
Content:
If you can read my burnout article at the link above, then perhaps you can tell me if the Startup Story seems like a fairy tale - true for a few, but not for the unwashed masses.

Author: brett
Content:
Language choice and thusly features of given languages are pretty pertinent to hackers trying to start startups.

Just don't upmod it. If you're lucky it will go away.

Author: jamiequint
Content: Some people are claiming even higher performance than this using nginx ( a relatively new Russian webserver). The preferred Rails "business" host EngineYard is using this right now.

Author: jamiequint
Content: Thanks for the link Elfan, I'm already a part of LinkedIn, but I think it is more of a tool for visualizing your connections not managing relationships. What do you think?

Author: jamiequint
Content: yeah I've been following that, the reason I asked this question is I've been working on a product since November that is doing something similar (I was hoping that 37 Signals' product was going to be more CRM-ish) I still think (from what 37 Signals shown so far) that there is still a tool that caters more towards individuals managing their personal networks (a niche within the contact management niche if you will). Any thoughts on this?
